v.v: Be merciful to me, God, for men are attacking me!
My enemies trample me all day long;
In God, whose word I praise—
All the day long they twist my words;
They gather themselves together, they hide themselves,
Do not let them escape doing iniquity.
Then my enemies will turn back on the day that I call to you;
The duty to fulfill my vows to you is on me, God;
For you have rescued my life from death;

v: All the day long those who fight me press their assault.
for there are many who arrogantly fight against me.
I will put my trust in you.
in God I have put my trust; I will not be afraid;
what can mere man do to me?
all their thoughts are against me for evil.
just as they have waited for my life.
Bring down the peoples in your anger, God.
and put my tears into your bottle;
are they not in your book?
this I know, that God is for me.
What can anyone do to me?
I will give thank offerings to you.
you have kept my feet from falling,
so that I may walk before God
in the light of the living.
